item.title: How to make my rsps work offline?
item.dc:creator: @jake.bellotti jake.bellotti
item.description:
@jake.bellotti wrote:

Sometimes in the runserver.bat it will contain the ip it connects to. Otherwise just search through the client files. It shouldn’t take you long. And if you’re new it also helps you understand how the code works (If you read it) Hope you find out how to

item.title: How to make my rsps work offline?
item.dc:creator: @gelatine1 gelatine1
item.description:
@gelatine1 wrote:

hello i have downloaded a private server source code and now i want it to work offline. if i run the client.class then i get the main screen but i try to log in it says error connecting to server. i have been searching around and i have seen that i should change the ip to 0.0.0.0 or 127.0.0.1 but i don’t know how do that.
i have searched in the client.java file but i don’t see how i could change any ip there. this is the code ihave found there.

[code]daysSinceRecovChange = inStream.method427();
unreadMessages = inStream.method435();//works
membersInt = inStream.readUnsignedByte();
lastLoginIp = inStream.method440();//works
daysSinceLastLogin = inStream.readUnsignedWord();//works

				signlink.dnslookup(TextClass.ipDecryption(lastLoginIp));
				clearTopInterfaces();[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: How to make my rsps work offline?
